w: Did I not clearly reveal Myself
so that no one in it
and her husband had been killed
But when they got up early
so they could go on their way
and threw them into such confusion
So Saul and his servant went up
and you are to anoint him
And when I send you off
and what was attached to it
And after they had come down
They got up early in the morning
and I will send you on your way
and I will reveal to you
When Saul and his servant arrived
they were not to be found
But when they looked for him
and he burned with great anger
your God, [then all will be well]
And I will continue to teach
and [a third of a shekel] for repointing
And when they had called the roll
How much better it would have been
after the Israelites had struck down
[Why have You not answered Your servant this day? If the fault is with me or my son Jonathan, respond with Urim, but if the fault is with the men of Israel,] respond
that He should change His mind
So Jesse sent for [his youngest son]
was leading them out to battle
and presented them as payment in full
and send you on your way
must he be put to death
so that he could rise up
yet he has paid me back
inside the inner circle of the camp
in the inner circle of the camp
Since he has made himself an utter stench
for him to regain the favor
that you should march in and out
for you will surely overtake them
and those on the other side
